name: Crazy Post Apocalyptic Taxi Driver 2
description:
This is a game that I made back in college  although I have added a pause menu, I haven't added or tweaked anything else in the interest of being authentic. The game sees the player endlessly delivering passengers from different corners of the post apocalyptic dessert to the thunder dome, trying to avoid enemies as, since the player can't fight back, the players main defence will be running. As much as I like this project I'll be the first to admit that it's not my finest work. But that's okay, because it's only by making this slightly confusing, slightly buggy, not particularly pretty game, that I'll have a battle plan should I ever make Crazy Post Apocalyptic Taxi Driver 3. 

Almost all of the models where found on sketchfab but it was so long ago now that I've lost all of the links for them
